content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were camping out in our suburban backyard.  he was approximately ten and i was about nine.  i was asleep.  he began tapping on me to awaken me.  when i opened my eyes i saw a three inch long cigar shaped, illuminated object, pulsating with light, hovering above our heads.  it scared me so badly that i got up and ran in the house to tell my parents.  he  chased the object for about a block.  he said it moved at right angles - moving up several feet to avoid a wall, than moving forward, then moving up again several feet, then moving forward again.  he states that it was more the size of a hot dog.  i still believe that it was smaller.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: craft hovering 4 feet over 2 children

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home westerly on our road noticed very bright white light in the sky nearly due west and 15 to 20 degrees above the mountains. got home, ran inside, got dad, got binocs (25x80) and video camera (20x optical w/ image stablization) and watched it for about 30 minutes until it set with the stars over the horizon. we kept trying to think of what else it could be, mylar research balloon reflecting the sun? international space station? planet? definitely not a plane. finally, dad said, jesus! it really must be a ufo. it was very amazing and we were all quite giddy and excited.

brightly, distinctly colored rings would rotate around the orb latitudinally from bottom to top, changing colors with each cycle, sometimes regularly, sometimes staying the same for several minutes. brightness seemed to deminish somewhat as it neared the horizon but as it set behind the mountain it showed an aroura like the setting moon.

we got digital photos and video on card and tape but haven't reveiwed them yet. will follow up. object was pretty distant so even at 20x probably won't look like much. maybe it was a weather balloon, but i don't think so.  

that's it.
content.summary: Very bright (10 times venus) moved w/ stars to set over rocky mts. @ 10:15, bright white center w/alternating red, blue, green, yellow rings. no movement. stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
In the beginning of december of 2004 i was traveling north on rt.9a leaving ossining and entering croton. i was in my car a 1991 eagle talon with 2 other friends in the vehicle, we were on our way home from a night out and i was the designated driver so i had not had anything alcoholic to drink. both friends were asleep at the time because it took us close to an hour to get home so no one else witnessed the event. as i was driving over a small bridge parallel to the croton train station a large flash lit up the entire sky and it appeared to be comming from somewhere north or slightly northwest of our location. right after the flash i felt as if my entire body was engulfed by goosebumps, and at this moment i am feeling the same sensation. at the time i didnt think much of the event and blamed my imagination or maybe i was just seeing something especially because there were no witnesses so i ignored it. about a month later on a snowy night i was driving to the croton point park which is within a mile of the location i described above to fool around in the snow with my car. i was alone this time, i was on the road that leads to the croton point parking lot when once again there was a massive flash whitch lit up the sky but unlike last time it was snowing quite heavily and the sky was covered by clouds yet the flash seemed to be eminating from below the clouds because i vaguely remember seeing the clouds being iluminated. once again my body was engulfed with goosebumps and this time i was quite frightened especially because my location was secluded with no one near by. once again the flash seemed to be emanating from the north or northwest. finally about a year ago i was traveling south on rt.9 leaving montrose going towards croton when once again i saw the flash again and the sensation i experienced the same feeling as before. this time i was several miles north of the location i had witnessed the flash the last 2 times and this time the flash seemed to come from the west. strangely this may have nothing to do with these incidences but there is an active nuclear reactor in peekskill called indian point which is also extremely close to these locations i mentioned above. i have heard rumors that this reactor sits on an inactive fault line but dont quote me on that. i have never had any eye sirgury nor do i wear glasses or contacts and consider my eyes to be in perfect condition and the last time i had a full eye exam was about 2 years before the first sighting. i have believed in ufos and extra terrestreals for many years after i was introduced to a show called "unsolved mysteries." since then i enjoy watching any kind of show relating to this subject mainly the shows on the scifi channel which is where i heard of your organization and led me to come forward with this information. i know i saw those flashes but what caused them i can not explain, and after researching ufo sightings in westchester county i found that there have been quite a few so anything is possible. i hope this may help but if this turns out to be nothing i am deeply sorry.

thank you
vitor
content.summary: Bright flash that lit up the night sky 3 seperate occasions in the same general area near nuclear reactor

content.detailedDescription: I was coming down a mountain on i-68 east bound in md. at approx. 3a.M early nov. of 2002. in the distance i saw 4 white lights decending from the sky that i perceived to be a large aircraft with the landing lights on. being familiar with that area, i could not think of an airport around there that could handle a plane of that size and was very curious as to where it was going to land. keeping in mind that this was not too far nautically (50 mi.+-) from washington d.C. i thought maybe it was military, and there was a base/airfield nearby that i was'nt aware of. i lost sight of it due to the road being cut through the mountain,and the trees that grow along that stretch. about 2 min. passed and i was coming to the jct. of i-68 and i-70 in hancock,md. when those lights came back into view, only now i could clearly see that it was a large disk shaped object hovering over a hill just north of i-70. it was no more than 50 ft. above the trees and standing still. absolutely huge. brownish/grey in color. the white lights that i had seen were on the edge of it, contured to the edge much like those of an aircraft. i could make out what i can only describe as portals here and there on it, no real pattern to them, and no light emitting from them. i could also see the overlapping "seams" where the metal that it was made from joined each other, along with a very short(from my vantage point) "l" shaped pipe coming from it. i had just a few sec. earlier told myself to observe everything that i could about it, because "you ain't never going to see anything like this again." as i was now directly in front of it, and at the closest point with out it being hidden by tree tops, i could see that in the center of it was a cicular part that looked to be of a translucent material that was turning orange,redish,and yellow/orange. with out stopping,i watched it until i had passed it completely. may i mention that i am a long distance truck driver and i was in my truck at the time. traffic was very light, and what ever traffic there was going west bound would probably not have seen it given the incline of the hill and their closeness to the hill. a few miles later, as i was coming up on i-81 jct.,i heard on the c.B., another truck driver, obviously going east, ask for a west bounder.(for a"bear" report). i picked up my mic and asked for that truck going east and where he was. as i thought, he was a few miles behind me, so i asked him had he seen that thing above the hill at the 68/70 jct. he said "did that look like a ufo to you, driver?" i said it sure did. he said "no i did'nt see it, but my wife did, i was busy looking at that cop on the side of the road standing outside of his car". so somewhere out there, there is a truck driver and his wife, and an officer of the law that can vouch for my story. may i stress that i do not take drugs of any sort, i don't drink, and i was'nt tired. and also, it was a pleasure relating this to someone other than my wife and family. thank you.
content.summary: Similar to star-ship enterprise(seriously) without tail section, but smaller.

content.detailedDescription:
National ufo reporting center sighting report 
occurred : 9/20/2000 18:00 (entered as : 09/20/2000 18:00)
reported: 11/1/2005 8:37:24 pm 20:37
posted: 11/3/2005
location: north bergen, nj
shape: triangle
duration:10 
triangle spinning

it was a clear day talking to a friend sitted facing the artificial lake in the park james bradock, when i notice a dark form over the three line what look like a plastic trahs back turns out to be a black triangle with no lights, moving slowly and at low altitute, 

when i mentioned that to my friend we stood up ,with my afghan dog by the leash after a couple of minutes of my skeptic friend asking what it was almost scare, the other witness got tangled with us,as he was walking and looking at the object at the same time, he was a white male blond, middle age, the comment was that it was probably a radio controlled model, i said i don't think so but it would be cool to have one!!. 

me and my friend tried to locate somebody with a camera to no avail. we follow the object, and then in the middle of the lake started to spin slowly on its axis!!, every 3 seconds more less , following and absolutely silent and straight path despite the mild wind moving the trees. i had the chance to compare against the 2 passenger planes in the horizon,this after the object heading for manhattan crossing the boulevard east,and the hudson river, it was completely flat from below no protruding shapes, and absolutely majestic and spooky in its fly solid in the air. i have found that a lady saw it too in rockland county,and reported it to jeff rense.Com, while hiking she described mayan like designs and a hull on top this is because the exact date would be better known this way.


((nuforc note: witness indicates that the date of the event above is approximate. pd)) 

above the copy from nuforc but need to add up that direction of flight was west to east and the wind was blowing moving tree tops but the object was absolutely unafected , also it started spining as i was closer underneath it by the border of the artifitial lake walking north the i headed east following it my dog wasn't scared nor the golden retriever (i think it was that breed)of the other witness, my friend was looking for a camera but he was frighten so after a while he would only keep yelling about what it was he reamained at a distance all the time .So i walked to the parking lot of the building 8450 were i used to live. i was stoped by the fence delimitating the deep cliff above edgewater shore line so it did vanished going the manhattan shore line.
content.summary: Black triangle spinning
content.locationName: WEST NY,FORT LEE, EDGEWAT, New Jersey

content.detailedDescription:
Greetings, i have four digital camera pictures of unknown ufos, one series of two pictures that appear to show an object travelling a likely trajectory from one point ['image1of2'] a distance away from my the porch of my parent's house (one mile away??) to point (b)['image2of2'], roughly parallel above my house. 

google maps 'calder ave, north vancouver, bc, canada' and the northernmost location of the capilano park/ southernmost point of capilano lake/ (our water reserve) is where the object appeared to be in the first picture, to the second picture where the object appears to be close to the area around calder ave (it nearly visually disappears over the rooftop of our house ) travelling towards the middle part of lynn canyon park. (the time frame between the two images is around 10-15 seconds) 

the same day (the properities indicate july 8, 2004 it seems), i took a picture of grouse mountain (directly to the right of our house) showing an mysterious object that appears to be uniformly saucer-shaped... you decide. after many, many fruitless days of snapping pictures of clear skies, i took another picture [image 'abovevancouver'] showing two of the same strange objects apparently directly overhead vancouver city. 

what astounded me is that i did not see these objects in all four pictures. interestingly enough, the reason why i took these random pictures was because the fact that, beforehand, i read on the internet that many people who captured pictures of ufos did not see them at all, but their cameras! so outside with the digital camera on full res and a mind addled by weed... bam! 

i just hope these aren't snaps of bugs zipping by my camera... it couldn't be! my doubts kept me from publishing these pictures for 3-5 years (blame the wide timeframe on the pot), but... you decide, and share if you think its legit.

the objects are there in the pictures. look carefully, they're either faded or tucked in the corners. i'm sending you the whole image file(s)


for the truth...Good luck.

glen parrish
content.summary: Unseen cigar object captured on digital camera, unseen with unaided eye

content.detailedDescription:
During ice break-up last april 2006, we the people of waterhen lake first nation (a cree tribe reservation), started noticing frequent predictable ufo activity.  it came to a point that each night at about 10:30pm until about 11:00pm, people would be waiting for the expected light show.  i tried to convince a friend from a neighboring town to bring his digital camera and to come and witness the activity, but he said he had other things to do that evening and that he would check it out some other night.  in a serious way i guaranteed him about a 75 percent chance he would record something that night (before the sightings, i would never even give anyone a 1 percent chance of a ufo sighting).  that night was the best light show we had ever seen.  at first it formed a semi-circle of lights with each light flickering on in sequence, then would flicker off in sequence but in reverse order.  the lights then repeated the sequence, but this time in a row which stretched out about a half mile to three quarters of a mile. the approximate distance from our viewing area to the lights was about two miles away across the lake.  just before i got to the sighting area, an rcmp constable had just pulled someone over and had his lights flashing.  when i pulled up beside him i told him to look to the northwest.  the rcmp constable just said "oh, there back".  from this statement, i knew he had seen them before.  

one other thing is that we are situated near the cold lake air weapons range.  we see many types of military aircraft from many countries flying in our airspace.  you just get use to the noise. whatever we seen that night didn't make a noise and there was no wind that night. these lights resembled what were referred to as the phoenix lights.

i am not guaranteeing that we will see a repeat from last year, but it would be worth checking it out, wouldn't you say.  i am however guaranteeing a location to view from with no interference from anyone. i tried to report this to other agencies but i got no response.  i just recently found out about mufon.  to be honest, i don't know what i seen that night, after all ufo does mean 'unidentified' flying object.

there was a video released to the canadian broadcasting corportation (cbc)and they did show it.  it was a spectacle and they picked the wrong individual (nightwatchman) to represent us and i am not proud of how it was presented.
since then i have been elected into council and would like to remain anonymous please.  i will give you the utmost respect if you do the same.  

thank you
content.summary: Over 50 witnesses including and rcmp officer.

content.detailedDescription:
Here is the report i sent to ufosnw.Com


date of sighting: april 7, 2007
time of sighting: afternoon (exact time unknown)
date sighting reported: april 9, 2007
duration of sighting: 11 seconds
location of sighting: camano island, washington (see map)
latitude: 48.19 degrees north 
longitude: 122.5 degrees west 
number of witnesses: one
weather: cloud ceiling 5,000 to 7,000 feet. light rain in area. visibility 8 to 10 miles. 

description (in witness's own words): i took this footage on the afternoon of saturday, april 7th, 2007. you should be able to see clearly an orb/balloon? the orb/balloon was stationary and then rose up. i didn't see this object at the time so i didnt zoom in on it. i was just filming the family farm and happened to notice this while i was viewing my footage. i have a higher quality video also, but i'm not sure if you could view it. it is a 35mb .Mod file (from a jvc harddisk camcorder). 

second report by the witness (in response to my questions): ok the orb is first visible at 3 seconds into the video clip in the middle right hand side of the screen, you will see like a white ball overlapping a power line with water in the background. it is stationary. at 7 seconds you see the object start to rise. watch very closely upper right hand corner at 13-14 seconds and you can clearly see a spherical object against the blue sky.

third report by witness: glad you saw what i saw. it is indeed very interesting. the film is taken facing south/southeast. the closest business is right next to where this was, the camano island fire department, right next to that is a small park and a group of businesses (camano island coffee roasters is one) it is known as terry's corner. the actual farm where i believe the orb is hovering over has an antique shop and the guy raises grass fed beef. the thing that gets me is that i can only really think of one real possiblity for what this could be and that is a weather balloon. but that really doesn't make sense being that it was perfectly spherical (not what i know weather balloons to look like) and it was above my neighbor's farm, and it was hovering for a few seconds, did not rise like a helium balloon would. also the fact that it was a fairly low altitude (50-100 feet?) makes it seem even less likely that it could be a balloon. the only other thing that i can think of, that i don't take seriously is "swamp gas"? (because there is a pond right next to that area as you can see from the sattelite view.) this isn't one of those "lights in the sky" kinda things, its so clear and at a low altitude, it should be easy to explain away if there is a good explanation. i'm going to go visit the farmer guy and ask if he saw anything (or were launching any weather balloons?) and i'll also call the fire department and ask them since they are right smack dab next to where this happened.
content.summary: Orb captured on video accidentaly

content.detailedDescription:
I was on 12th street in princeton, looking northeast when i spotted a white mirroed typed dimond shape moving across the sky.  it was flying northwest to the southeast.

it was there only about 10 seconds, and passed behind a cloud.
content.summary: White mirrored diamon

content.detailedDescription:
It was dark, around 9:45pm. i stepped outside onto my porch to smoke a cigarette and i saw two objects flying in tandem at about the height that airplanes fly around here. the sky was clear and i could see stars too. i could only see a row of lights blinking for each craft. it looked like each object had at least 4 lights, maybe 5, and they all appeared to blink. the light in the center of the row of lights was red and the other lights were white or yellow. i heard a low rumbling noise. when i noticed them i did not think they were airplanes because of the way they flew together and maintained the space between them and the lights looked strange. my first thought was that they were ufos, then i thought, no, they are probably airplanes. but i didn't really think they were airplanes. it was exciting and i tried to get a good look and count the lights, but they were pretty far away and i can't be sure about it. they had too many lights to be airplanes i think, and they made a low rumbling noise that wasn't like airplanes. they flew in a straight path, about the speed of airplanes. they were heading west and crossed the sky in about 5 minutes. it occurred to me that they could be military planes, the really big ones, flying together. i went inside and got my mother to come out and look at them. she saw them too. we watched them disappear behind some trees over the horizon. 
i don't know. they could have been those really big military planes, but they were strange. i don't know if i should report it, but maybe somebody else saw it?
content.summary: Two objects moving in tandem. i could only see flashing lights, white and red.

content.detailedDescription: When i was 5 i would all ways have a dreem wher i would wake up and it was like a big rope was around my chest but nothing was ther.No one was around ether but i was pulled thew the hall way. my moms dore was closed and it would never be closed at night. i would go thew the living room and thew the sliding glass dore to the back yard .Once i would get right under this light i would look up that would be it.Just last year i was sleeping with my husband i woke up looked stright ahead it was looking at me i froze up every part of my body was tence.I finly got up the courge to quikly lay back down and through the covers over my head. i slowly looked back up and it was gone.  i stared to panic i woke my husband up and told him i think i herd a noise in the office. he looked around thir was nothing. i didnt go back to sleep that night. later that morning after my husband whent to work i tried to find something in the living room that would have made me see that.Nothing,nothing at all.Thir was a light on in the living room that night.I rember its little sholer thir wasnt anny change of color from the lamp it was a dull color like a matt finish.I think my husband think i am crazy
content.summary: One was in my living room

content.detailedDescription: On april 10th, 2007 at 2:22pm.  i was traveling on i45 north passed 1960 toward woodlands, tx when i saw a whitish flying abject.   when i first saw the object, i thought it was an airplane, but it caught my attention because it has some sort of lighting frequency.  i had my sunglasses at the time, i lifted it up for a second to see what it was but i couldn't see it without my sunglasses.  when i put my sunglasses back on, i saw it flew into a cloud.  if it was an airplane and traveling as fast as it was before, it should reappear on the other side of the cloud in just a few seconds, but it didn't.  i wonder if anyone else saw what happening?
content.summary: Whitish fast traveling rod or cigar shape flying object

content.detailedDescription: On this particular morning there was a lot of aircraft traffic over my place of work which was unusal as you hardly ever see or hear an aircraft flying overhead. the sky was clear and the weather was fine at about 10 or 11 o'clock in the morning i decided to go outside my workshop to have a break, while i was outside i happened to look up into the sky, as i looked up i could see an airliner which was flying fairly low, the plane was silver with no visable markings. while i watched it flyover i happened to notice comming from the north west to south east a red oxide coloured disced shaped object which did a complete circled around the fusilege of the aircraft and then moved off at high speed to the south east. approximately 5 seconds after this the same craft came back this time from the south west to the north east circling the aircraft again and heading off towards the north east. on that particular day because of the amount of air traffic passing over that morning there must have been something onboard that particular aircraft that it was interested in.
content.summary: Ufo circling aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Every night approximately at 8 p.M. numerous lighted objects appear and stay there until approximately 6 a.M.  they move about freely .  one of them is bright and the others are dim.We happened to look up at the sky. the way it was moving. my son and i saw it. not knowing what it is.  hard to get pictures of this have to see it in reality.  when it left around at daylight.
content.summary: Numerous objects appear every night at the same time .

content.detailedDescription: Every night at approximately 8. p.M. numerous lighted objects appear and stay their until 5 or 6 a.M.  they move about freely and one has a bright light and others are dim.  they don't male any noise. looked up at the sky and noticed them.  the way they kept moving. very hard to get pi ctures. it is best if you see it. all you see is lights and it being there every night at the same time seems unusual. the idea of not knowing what it is is unsettling.  my son sees it and my my neighbor saw it and we cannot figure it out. when the day light starts it leaves in fact saw one going through the clouds at 6 a.M.
content.summary: Every night numerous lighted objects appear at the same time and move about freely.

content.detailedDescription: I didn't realize that i had actually got something with my sony 3.2 mb cyber shot camera but when i enlarged the bright light i had seen on saturday you can see the shape & brightness compared to the stars,just above the roof peek, if you scan around the photo you can also see other round objects,saturday night was very clear.
content.summary: If you look over the roof of the home, & zoom in on the bright light..

content.detailedDescription:
This is an incredible capture, 1 of a kind shot it appears to me, and i just found it going through old photographs from 1993. so i scanned it into my pc and did a negative image of it, and wow ! look at whats going on. it appears that the object was flying from above and you can even see the air trail from the angle it came in on. shutter speed was more than likely set at 1000 , because of bright sunshine that day,. so object was going basically the speed of light. 

i even did a negative on it and it shows up even better. i have more pictures , if your interested in seeing them, but i will attach the original first, and the other 2 will be my negative and zoom pictures. and you can do your image enhancements.

i have a long history with ufo footage , i was on a show called " ufos: the best evidence ever caught on tape 2 "  about 1999 i think that aired on fox network.

from 1995 to 2000 , i captured a total of 37 different sightings caught on video, but, i have not been active on my research for 7 yrs now, but now for some reason i am starting to get back into it, and will get my video camera out again soon. wish me luck on getting new footage. 

finding this picture among others that i thought was lost , was a wakeup call to myself i think , and i decided to go ahead and email this photograph to you , because its just simply fantastic. especially with the history behind shiprock.

my personal thoughts on my picture would be , that the volcano below is wide open lava tube , maybe going undeground for 100's of miles. and this is an entrance way. remember that the history for the hollow earth theory says there is a land below and they called it agartha !  yes, i know my history well. 

please email me for furthur questions if need be.

thank you,
chris miller
content.summary: Going back through old photo's , found this picture of shiprock , nm  !

content.detailedDescription:
At around 7.50 pm on monday (9/4/2007) night, i received a phone call from my dad. i live in a group of units in south frankston, and the guy who lives in the unit next door is a mate of my dads. he often does odd jobs like painting for my dad. dad was having trouble contacting alby(the guy next door)as, alby has no phone connected. so he called me on my mobile, and asked to to go next door to see if alby was home.

so over i went knocked on the door, found alby, gave him the phone and told him my dad wanted to speak to him. while alby was speaking to my dad, i stood on the porch of his unit and leaned against the security door too keep it open, and started gazing up at the stars as it was another very clear night filled with stars. as i listened to alby speaking on my phone while he was standing on the inside of his door way, i continued to scan the skies for several minutes wondering when the convesation between the 2 would end, so i could go back inside and watch t.V.

then after almost 10 minutes,with alby still talking on the phone, a group of lights came into view from behind a tall tree across the back of our units. at first i thought it was a helicopter or a light plane flying at low altitude. but almost emmediatley it was obvious that something was strange about this craft. it travelled at a very slow pace, and being fairly close to us in the sky made no noise what so ever. the lights which i initially thought were from plane/helicopter, did'nt look too unusual, but the array in which they were set was not like any plane i have seen before.

the lights were set in a diamond shape. red lights were set at the front or "nose" of the oject, and at the back or "tail" of the ufo, and they did'nt flicker. 2 white lights which also did'nt flicker were set on either wing, or side of the craft, these 4 lights giving it a diamond- like apearance. there was also a red flashing light set in the center of this craft.

the object was flying fairly low to the ground, i would guess under 1000 meters.(around here police helicopters cruising over the neighbourhoods happens fairly often at both day and night, and you get to see them come down pretty low and close to your roof)the fact that i could not hear any noise from this thing is the most puzzling thing for me. if it were a chopper i would of heard it long before i clapped eyes on it and by the time i could see it the noise would have been very loud.

as i watched this thing from the steps of alby's unit i wondered if he'd seen it. just as i decided to interupt his conversation and ask him about it alby exclaimed, "whats that?" to me. i answered "i dunno?". the object slowly drifted over the units and out over an oval that is across the road from our block of units. i headed down to the bottom albys porch and moved into the yard to get a better look at the thing. then alby came down and gave me my phone. 

"heres your phone back" alby said has he handed it to me. then he said "what the hell is that thing?" i said "i really dont know, its not a plane or a chopper, its to quite!" then he said, "i am going out the front to the street to get a better view!" i then lifted the phone to my ear and started walking out to the front of the units. my dad was talking to me but i was still looking at this thing in the sky. eventualy dad asked what was wrong as i was more interested at watching this craft than talking on the phone, so i just said, "ah dad there is just something weird up in the sky that alby and i are looking at." 

my dad laughed and said "what have you guys been drinking." i said "nothing, i just dont know what it is. i'm glad alby seen it too cause you'd think i am seeing things or going mad" dad who is a fair skeptic, said "well ok." i told him that id catch him later, hung up and ran to where alby was still looking at this craft which had floated off into the distance over port phillip bay. you could not make out the shape now, and if this view was all you saw of it you would probably think it is some type of conventional aircraft.

we stayed out the front for about 10 more minutes then to our amazment it came back into view from a different angle and again glided fairly close to our group of units, not as close as the first pass but close enough to see it was the same thing. after we lost sight of it again over the distance, i decided to go and get my camera. so i headed in grabbed my digital camera and headed back out to where alby still stood.

there was nothing for about 15 minutes then again it came back from a different direction cruised in fairly close to our street and then headed in the general direction of the mornington peninsula. i attempted to take photos of it this last time, but the 6 or so shots i managed to take show nothing but the clear night sky and some trees and street lamps. alby and i just don't know what this was. the only thing that moves silently like, was some type of blimb, but ive seen them before. i have seen blimbs at night pass over my house several times (allan bond used to have an advertising blimb years ago), and if it was for advertising i saw no sign. it was to small to be one of those things. i will be checking out in papers and on the net to see if any blimps, etc were flying over frankston last night. i wonder if any other people saw it.
content.summary: Ufo sighted in evening on clear night. looked to be diamond shaped, had 2 red lights on front and back, + 2 white lights on either side. one red flashing light in center of object. ufo was flying low (500-1000 meters), was silent and passed by us 3 times.

content.detailedDescription: On easter sunday 2007, (april 8th 2007) i received a voice mail from jason bourne, informing me that his brother believes he was the victim of an abduction, in his home located in milton vermont. currently the details are a bit cloudy, but i will update cms as the case progresses.
content.summary: Ufo abduction? reported directly to state director, dan lavilette

content.detailedDescription:
Between the hours of 0115 and 0145 i was standing on my front deck at home. while looking at the stars i noticed a flashing type of light
aprox 50deg in the western sky. it was there for aprox 30min flashing
mostly white and some red colors. the light/pulse were aprox 
10 seconds apart and stable in the sky. as the stars in the sky moved due to earth rotation the flash/pulse remained in the same location. some flashes were brighter than others until they came to a stop at aprox 0145
the flashes were not as bright as venus but bright enough to notice
content.summary: Flash of light in night sky

content.detailedDescription: being a big fan of airplanes i heard a large aircraft fly over my house on april 1st. at 11:00 p.M. i went to my backyard and saw it was horizon air making a left hand turn for runway 34 south of the airport. when the aircraft was close to final approach i saw what appeared to be another aircraft taking off in its path through the trees. after a short moment the light was clearly visible and my first thought was it was an aircraft with an engine fire. looking at the object to the north moving to my right, i ran in the house and  got my digital camera and took two pictures at 12x optical. then the object slowly dropped down from my sight. using the software on my camera i zoomed in on the object and saw this was clearly not an aircraft. the next morning i took the pictures to the redding record searchlight news paper. there environmental reporters looked at the photos and later contacted military, horizon air and f.A.A. with no reports of seeing the object.
content.summary: While watching an aircraft turn to land at the redding airport i saw a fireball in the same area.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were standing on the corner of elmhurst and albion rd, waiting for a bus. we looked across the street and above the tree line of the humber valley golf course was a space ship. it was a solid structured craft, metallic gray.It was shaped like two saucers with their rims together. it was huge with many spots that looked like windows. in the center were 3 rows of lights that flickered on and off one after the other. it was hovering. it moved to the right a bit and then to the left. then it started to move toward us. we grabbed a hold of each other in fear. it stopped then, like it knew what we were feeling. it then hovered back towards the humber river and moved back and forth in the direction of the river. then it came back to it's original position and seemed to let us take a very good look at it. then it shifted to a 45 degree angle with the higher end facing the northwest and then it took off. there was combustion from the lower angle of the ship as it sped upwards and northwest and disappeared in a couple of seconds. there was no visible difference of one side of the ship or the other.  we gasped and i saw a woman about 40 walking up albion and i ran up to her and i said "did you see that!" she said "yeah!" we didn't say anything else , i guess because we were in shock and it was so extrordinary. a police car from 23rd division pulled into the little plaza and parked directly behind us and he went into the little store. i said to my boyfriend, " we should tell the police and ask him if he saw it." we were afraid to tell or ask him. i guess if he did see it he also felt the same way. i haven't seen my then boyfriend for about 30 years. if we find him i'm sure he will tell you the same thing. this is true. it was the middle of the day.It wasn't a light, or a flash. it was solid, clearly visible and there was no mistaking what it was. i get frustrated watching the shows on tv. little blips and lights. if you help me find my old boyfriend and maybe that woman or the cop or someone else that must have seen it, we can help the world to really know that we are not alone. please get back to me. i have other things to convey about this.
content.summary: 2 saucers together

content.detailedDescription:
For many months now, both my house mate-randy and i have been observing a large star-like object in the evening and night sky to the west of our ne portland residence location. some nights it seems to be closer to earth than others - but it usually is stationary for some hours, then disappears, before any other stars dim. also, it is the first one in the sky - often the only one in the sky and it is huge - 5-10 times the size of the biggest stars in the night sky. 

looking through the binoculars, it definiely is not a star; it shines about 100 times brighter than any brightest star in the night sky - it is about 10 times larger that any stars in that quadrant, and it seems to flicker or sometimes pulse it's lights (which have a bluish hue and reddish tinge to it at times). the light seems to be more like a hallogen type light or brightness, and it seems to get closer and farther away from the earth (moving) as the night progresses. 

recently, we've noticed that there is another similar object to the south of the other one. they both are bright, and obviously huge, whatever they are. there are times, when we take out our doggie in the back yard, when we notice the object gone, all of a sudden, or perhaps, the lights have been turned off. then, later, it appears a long distance from its original location (higher or lower in the sky and farther to the north or south), once more. it usually sits to the west of our residence, at about a 25'-30' angle from the western horizon. 

we have thought of taking photos of it with our digital camera, but figured nothing would really register, except a bright spot in the sky, so why bother. if you instruct us to take photographs, and tell us how and with what type of equipment, we will certianly attempt it, if they will still be here. 

we always feel "strangely" after these sightings, often feeling a bit frightened, just by the obvious sheer size of it. it often feels like "someone is watching us." nothing that we can put our fingers on, but it is unnerving nevertheless. fyi: i always want to run in the house and lock all the doors for some inexplicable reason. by the way, the object is typically still there, and its lights are flickering, like the sunrays off a huge diamond. 

it would be helpful if someone from your organization would check this phenomenon out, as it is rather disturbing to note it just sitting there, as "if observing us," and know that no one from earth (that we know of) is atempting to find out what's going on with it. we realize that if that is some kind of a "space ship of alien origins," then given their size and obvious technological superiority, we, on earth, are probably helpless and unlikely to investigate it with any certainty or confidence. 

thank you for your assistance on this. it is my hope and expectations that i will not have unwanted "visits from the men in black," or have any of my personal information distributed outside of your scientific circle of inquiry. 

respectfully,~ eva starmach, ph.D. ~
content.summary: Large, bright, object in the western sky in portland, oregon

content.detailedDescription: It was the election day in p.R. in the town of juana diaz in the year 1967 or 68. me and three of my friends after voting went to the plaza to celebrate with everybody else the results of this election.When we where standing in the middle of the crowd, we all saw this egg shape form thing in the sky; we just looked at each other with ammusement.We did not talk to each other until the thing was gone.We couldnt move and to our surprise nobody else seem to care to look up so we did for about 20 to 25 minutes...There was also a humming sound that was silenced by the noise of the crowd coming from this thing.It was real high  in the sky and got closer in zig zag motion real slow;then if as the thing got scare went up in super fast  motion and dissapear into the sky.The people that saw this are dead now, this included my mother in law at the time. since then i had the need to tell someone about it, but never had the chance to do it until now. dont know if this will be of any help, but it was real and also very scary. if you need more information please fell free to contact me at 754 422 5819( my cell).
content.summary: Election day  at the public plaza on top of the crowd it went real slow down then up and dissapear into the sky

content.detailedDescription: My husband & i were headed to medford. we were working, hauling a load of junk vehicles to the wrecking yard. (please do not include that in the report though--i really don���t want anyone to know who we are) it was very cloudy but not raining and i���m not sure if it was windy or not. we were on hwy 62 getting ready to turn onto hwy 234 when i saw a shiny dot in the clouds just above the mountains. i tried to zoom in on it then and was not able to find it in the viewfinder. my husband couldn���t see it. i couldn���t find it or see it from hwy 234 but i kept scanning the sky. when we were on modoc rd. i saw it again. it was going from shiny to dark to shiny to dark and i was having a hard time finding it in the viewfinder. my husband couldn���t find a good spot to pull over with the load we were hauling and still couldn���t see it. when i was able to find it and start recording it i was leaned over from the passenger side of the truck towards my husband looking between his face and the wind wing, the window was up. it was more of an oval or a cigar shape when i was zoomed in on it and i thought that when we got home and viewed it we would be able to see wings and be able to identify it as a plane. i thought it was moving south while i was watching it but when we viewed it on the tv it seemed to be staying in the same place. i stopped recording when some trees came in view and i couldn���t find it again. i don���t think it disappeared, i think it just went dark and i couldn���t see it again.
content.summary: Unknown over the hills of eagle point & white city

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were over at some friends of ours apartment and we had been just hanging out having fun and me and my friend were on his balcony and right in front of appeared four glowing lights moving across the sky that seemed to be perfectly spaced and glowing in and out like a beacon of sorts. we had a camcorder there at the time and quickly grabbed it and started to film the event that i like to call "the mesa lights". these lights were moving southwest in direction and were at a low altitude. the lights that i observed were only four that we saw and definitely moving across the sky fairly quickly, however observing this happen seemed much longer. my friend said that he had read about an airshow that was going on around this same time in the paper but now looking back at this footage again i don't believe that to be the case as there was no sound coming from these so called "jets". it was ominous, and where i currently live whenever military "jets" fly by at a much higher altitude the whole house practically shakes. the footage i have of these lights seemed much lower to me than any military "jet" i have ever seen. also, is it common to practice for an airshow in the evening? that question still to this day looms in my head. all four of us there were very intigued by this event as we all watched in amazement these lights that none of us had ever seen before. it was a bit strange to have witnessed this, almost like maybe we saw something that we shouldn't have. afterwards some of us wanted to go follow them to see if we could document anything else but not everyone there was as interested in doing so. the lights ended up moving to far out of view from the balcony that we were on and we lost sight of them. my friend did call up the police and they had said that they had received a lot of calls on the lights but still confirmed it was planes practicing for an airshow. i never believed this theory. there we're no other lights on these objects neither like airplanes have that blink in the night sky when flying. all i know is that to this day i've shown numerous people (friends,family) the footage and we've all tried to come up with a logical explanation of what these objects could be and still no one can! here in arizona we had a mass sighting ~ 10 years ago called the phoenix lights and it still happens from time to time again. being that the 10th anniversay of this mass sighting just happened in march, it really sparked my interest to get my footage out there and share my story. i'm not sure what these lights in the sky were, but i do not feel they are military in any way.
content.summary: The mesa lights....Four lights in sky hovering low and beaconing without any sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Multiple flash events like shooting stars but low enough to exchange
of flashing light with what ever it was. i was on my front deck and
saw a flash near me and then i took my flashlight and mimmicked the
flash in the sky. after that it was a total exchange of flashes for
quite awhile. i just got tired of playing with the flashes that so i went back to bed.
content.summary: Like shooting start but low in atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: The witness was outside with his parents and older brother, not far from their home on beaver street in san francisco, california when all of a sudden an object streaked overhead. the witness stated that his brother called out "look at that" and when the witness looked up he observed a cigar shaped object that was black in color and had what appeared to be two bright white lights on its aft end. the observation lasted only for an estimated 2 to 2 1/2 seconds. there was no sound associated with the object, nor was there an exhaust or trail coming from the object. it had no appendages such as wings or tail. the witness estimated the object at 25 to 30 feet in length, moving at perhaps 400 mph at perhaps 2,000 ft altitude. the night was clear with no clouds, but with a light wind.
content.summary: Sighted a cigar shaped object with lights

content.detailedDescription: Witness reports he was out in front of his residence at 16 beaver street in san francisco, california on approximately 23 october 1999. he looked up into the night sky and observed a bright flash of light, similar to a bright spotlight. the flash was visible for approximately 5 seconds. the witness reported that the flash of light appeared to move slowly towards the northwest before vanishing.
content.summary: Bright flash in sky

content.detailedDescription: Blue hill observatory, massachusetts web cam image two lights side by side seems to be a common configuration- see movie two_lights.Mpg more web cam ufo's http://www.I-photo.Us/webcamufo.Htm
content.summary: Web cam image two lights sie by side  http://www.I-photo.Us/webcamufo.Htm
